name: OverviewTab
functionalRequirements:
## Overview Tab

### Purpose
Displays summary information and key metrics in the overview tab.

### Features
- Summary cards
- Key metrics display
- Recent activity
- Quick actions

dataRequirements.description: Displays summary information and key metrics

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- data: Overview data object
- metrics: Key metrics to display
- onAction: Action handler

properties.name: data
properties.type: {summary: string, activity: Array<{type: string, description: string, timestamp: string}>}

properties.name: metrics
properties.type: Array<{name: string, value: number, unit: string}>
